00019 #ifndef UVM_RESOURCE_DB_H
00020 #define UVM_RESOURCE_DB_H
00021 
00027 #include <string>
00028 #include <typeinfo>
00029 #include "base/uvm_resource_pool.h"
00030 #include "base/uvm_resource_t.h"
00031 #include "base/uvm_globals.h"
00032 
00033 namespace uvm {
00034 
00035 
00036 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00038 //
00039 template<class T>
00040 class uvm_resource_db
00041 {
00042 public:
00043     typedef uvm_resource<T>* rsrc_ptr_t;
00044     typedef uvm_resource<T>  rsrc_t;
00045 
00046     //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00048     //
00049     uvm_resource_db() {};
00050 
00051 
00052     //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00054     //
00055     ~uvm_resource_db() {};
00056     
00057     //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00059 
00065     static rsrc_ptr_t get_by_name(std::string scope, std::string name)
00066     {
00067         uvm_resource_base * rsrc_base = NULL;
00068         rsrc_ptr_t rsrc = NULL;
00069 
00070         uvm_resource_pool * rpool = uvm_resource_pool::get();
00071         //rsrc = rpool->get_by_name(scope, name, typeid(rsrc_ptr_t));
00072         rsrc_base = rpool->get_by_name(scope, name, typeid(rsrc_ptr_t));
00073         if (rsrc_base != NULL)
00074             rsrc = DCAST<rsrc_ptr_t> (rsrc_base);
00075         return rsrc;
00076     }
00077 
00078     //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00080 
00087     static rsrc_ptr_t get_by_name_regex(std::string scope, std::string name)
00088     {
00089         rsrc_ptr_t rsrc = NULL;
00090 
00091         uvm_resource_pool * rpool = uvm_resource_pool::get();
00092         rsrc = rpool->get_by_name_regex(scope, name, typeid(rsrc_ptr_t));
00093     }
00094 
00095 
00096     //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00098 
00105     static rsrc_ptr_t set_default(std::string scope, std::string name)
00106     {
00107         rsrc_ptr_t rsrc = new rsrc_t(name, scope);
00108         rsrc->set();
00109         uvm_rsrc_callback(UVM_RESOURCE_SET_DEFAULT, scope, name, rsrc);
00110         return rsrc;
00111     }
00112 
00113     //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00115 
00121     static void set(std::string scope, std::string name, T value)
00122     {
00123         rsrc_ptr_t rsrc = new rsrc_t(name, scope);
00124         rsrc->write(value);
00125         rsrc->set();
00126         uvm_rsrc_callback(UVM_RESOURCE_SET, scope, name, rsrc);
00127     }
00128 
00129     //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00131 
00137     static void set_override(std::string scope, std::string name, T value)
00138     {
00139         rsrc_ptr_t rsrc = new rsrc_t(name, scope);
00140         rsrc->write(value);
00141         rsrc->set_override();
00142         uvm_rsrc_callback(UVM_RESOURCE_SET_OVERRIDE, scope, name, rsrc);
00143     }
00144 
00145     //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00147 
00156     static bool read_by_name(std::string scope, std::string name, T &value)
00157     {
00158         bool       bsuccess = false;
00159         rsrc_ptr_t rsrc     = get_by_name(scope, name);
00160 
00161         if (rsrc != NULL)
00162         {
00163             value = rsrc->read();
00164             bsuccess = true;
00165         }
00166         return bsuccess;
00167 
00168     }
00169 
00170     //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00172 
00181     static bool write_by_name(std::string scope, std::string name, T value) 
00182     {
00183         bool       bsuccess = false;
00184         rsrc_ptr_t rsrc     = get_by_name(scope, name);
00185 
00186         if (rsrc != NULL)
00187         {
00188             rsrc->write(value);
00189             bsuccess = true;
00190         }
00191 
00192         uvm_rsrc_callback(UVM_RESOURCE_WRITE_BY_NAME, scope, name, rsrc);
00193         return bsuccess;
00194     }
00195 
00196     //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00198 
00206     static bool exists(std::string scope, std::string name)
00207     {
00208         if (get_by_name(scope, name) != NULL)
00209             return 1;
00210         else
00211             return 0;
00212     }
00213 
00214 };
00215 
00216 }   // namespace
00217 
00218 #endif // UVM_RESOURCE_DB_H
